Define Documentation

#define GetHMAC ( obj,
ctx   ) 
Value:
do { \
    Data_Get_Struct((obj), HMAC_CTX, (ctx)); \
    if (!(ctx)) { \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "HMAC wasn't initialized"); \
    } \
} while (0)
